verses.verse: Then went <S%H3212><s%> Samson <S%H8123><s%> to Gaza, <S%H5804><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> an harlot, <S%H2181><s%> and went <S%H935><s%> in to her.

And it was told the Gazites, <S%H5841><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Samson <S%H8123><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> here. And they compassed <S%H5437><s%> him in, and laid wait <S%H693><s%> for him all <S%H3605><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and were quiet <S%H2790><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the night, <S%H3915><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> In the morning, <S%H1242><s%> when <S%H5704><s%> it is day, <S%H1242><s%> we shall kill <S%H2026><s%> him.

And Samson <S%H8123><s%> lay <S%H7901><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> midnight, <S%H2677><s%> <S%H3915><s%> and arose <S%H6965><s%> at midnight, <S%H2677><s%> <S%H3915><s%> and took <S%H270><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> posts, <S%H4201><s%> and went <S%H5265><s%> away <S%H5265><s%> with them, bar <S%H1280><s%> and all, <S%H5973><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> them on his shoulders, <S%H3802><s%> and carried <S%H5927><s%> them up to the top <S%H7218><s%> of an hill <S%H2022><s%> that is before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Hebron. <S%H2275><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass afterward, <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> that he loved <S%H157><s%> a woman <S%H802><s%> in the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Sorek, <S%H7796><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Delilah. <S%H1807><s%>

And the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up to her, and said <S%H559><s%> to her, Entice <S%H6601><s%> him, and see <S%H7200><s%> wherein <S%H4100><s%> his great <S%H1419><s%> strength <S%H3581><s%> lies, and by what <S%H4100><s%> means we may prevail <S%H3201><s%> against him, that we may bind <S%H631><s%> him to afflict <S%H6031><s%> him; and we will give <S%H5414><s%> you every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> of us eleven <S%H505><s%> <S%H3967><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> pieces of silver. <S%H3701><s%>

And Delilah <S%H1807><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Samson, <S%H8123><s%> Tell <S%H5046><s%> me, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, wherein <S%H4100><s%> your great <S%H1419><s%> strength <S%H3581><s%> lies, and with which <S%H4100><s%> you might be bound <S%H631><s%> to afflict <S%H6031><s%> you.

And Samson <S%H8123><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to her, If <S%H518><s%> they bind <S%H631><s%> me with seven <S%H7651><s%> green <S%H3892><s%> thongs <S%H3499><s%> that were never <S%H3808><s%> dried, <S%H2717><s%> then shall I be weak, <S%H2470><s%> and be as another <S%H259><s%> man. <S%H120><s%>

Then the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> brought <S%H5927><s%> up to her seven <S%H7651><s%> green <S%H3892><s%> thongs <S%H3499><s%> which <S%H834><s%> had not been dried, <S%H2717><s%> and she bound <S%H631><s%> him with them.

Now there were men lying in wait, <S%H693><s%> abiding <S%H3427><s%> with her in the chamber. <S%H2315><s%> And she said <S%H559><s%> to him, The Philistines <S%H6430><s%> be on you, Samson. <S%H8123><s%> And he broke <S%H5423><s%> the thongs, <S%H3499><s%> as a thread <S%H6616><s%> of wick <S%H5296><s%> is broken <S%H5423><s%> when it touches <S%H7306><s%> the fire. <S%H784><s%> So his strength <S%H3581><s%> was not known. <S%H3045><s%>

And Delilah <S%H1807><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Samson, <S%H8123><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> you have mocked <S%H2048><s%> me, and told <S%H1696><s%> me lies: <S%H3576><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> tell <S%H5046><s%> me, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, with which <S%H4100><s%> you might be bound. <S%H631><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to her, If <S%H518><s%> they bind <S%H631><s%> me fast with new <S%H2319><s%> ropes <S%H5688><s%> that never <S%H3808><s%> were occupied, <S%H6213><s%> <S%H4399><s%> then shall I be weak, <S%H2470><s%> and be as another <S%H259><s%> man. <S%H120><s%>

Delilah <S%H1807><s%> therefore took <S%H3947><s%> new <S%H2319><s%> ropes, <S%H5688><s%> and bound <S%H631><s%> him therewith, and said <S%H559><s%> to him, The Philistines <S%H6430><s%> be on you, Samson. <S%H8123><s%> And there were liers in wait <S%H693><s%> abiding <S%H3427><s%> in the chamber. <S%H2315><s%> And he broke <S%H5423><s%> them from off <S%H5921><s%> his arms <S%H2220><s%> like a thread. <S%H2339><s%>

And Delilah <S%H1807><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Samson, <S%H8123><s%> Till now <S%H5704><s%> <S%H2008><s%> you have mocked <S%H2048><s%> me, and told <S%H1696><s%> me lies: <S%H3576><s%> tell <S%H5046><s%> me with which <S%H4100><s%> you might be bound. <S%H631><s%> And he said <S%H559><s%> to her, If <S%H518><s%> you weave <S%H707><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> locks <S%H4253><s%> of my head <S%H7218><s%> with the web. <S%H4545><s%>

And she fastened <S%H8628><s%> it with the pin, <S%H3489><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, The Philistines <S%H6430><s%> be on you, Samson. <S%H8123><s%> And he awaked <S%H3364><s%> out of his sleep, <S%H8142><s%> and went <S%H5265><s%> away <S%H5265><s%> with the pin <S%H3489><s%> of the beam, <S%H708><s%> and with the web. <S%H4545><s%>

And she said <S%H559><s%> to him, How <S%H349><s%> can you say, <S%H559><s%> I love <S%H157><s%> you, when your heart <S%H3820><s%> is not with me? you have mocked <S%H2048><s%> me these <S%H2088><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> times, <S%H6471><s%> and have not told <S%H5046><s%> me wherein <S%H4100><s%> your great <S%H1419><s%> strength <S%H3581><s%> lies.

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when <S%H3588><s%> she pressed <S%H6693><s%> him daily <S%H3117><s%> with her words, <S%H1697><s%> and urged <S%H509><s%> him, so that his soul <S%H5315><s%> was vexed <S%H7114><s%> to death; <S%H4191><s%>

That he told <S%H5046><s%> her all <S%H3605><s%> his heart, <S%H3820><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to her, There has not come <S%H5927><s%> a razor <S%H4177><s%> on my head; <S%H7218><s%> for I have been a Nazarite <S%H5139><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> from my mother's <S%H517><s%> womb: <S%H990><s%> if <S%H518><s%> I be shaven, <S%H1548><s%> then my strength <S%H3581><s%> will go <S%H5493><s%> from me, and I shall become <S%H2470><s%> weak, <S%H2470><s%> and be like any <S%H3605><s%> other man. <S%H120><s%>

And when Delilah <S%H1807><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that he had told <S%H5046><s%> her all <S%H3605><s%> his heart, <S%H3820><s%> she sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> for the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Come <S%H5927><s%> up this once, <S%H6471><s%> for he has showed <S%H5046><s%> me all <S%H3605><s%> his heart. <S%H3820><s%> Then the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up to her, and brought <S%H5927><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> in their hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And she made him sleep <S%H3462><s%> on her knees; <S%H1290><s%> and she called <S%H7121><s%> for a man, <S%H376><s%> and she caused him to shave <S%H1548><s%> off the seven <S%H7651><s%> locks <S%H4253><s%> of his head; <S%H7218><s%> and she began <S%H2490><s%> to afflict <S%H6031><s%> him, and his strength <S%H3581><s%> went <S%H5493><s%> from him.

And she said, <S%H559><s%> The Philistines <S%H6430><s%> be on you, Samson. <S%H8123><s%> And he awoke <S%H3364><s%> out of his sleep, <S%H8142><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> I will go <S%H3318><s%> out as at other times <S%H6471><s%> before, <S%H6471><s%> and shake <S%H5287><s%> myself. And he knew <S%H3045><s%> not that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was departed <S%H5493><s%> from him.

But the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> took <S%H270><s%> him, and put <S%H5365><s%> out his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and brought <S%H3381><s%> him down <S%H3381><s%> to Gaza, <S%H5804><s%> and bound <S%H631><s%> him with fetters <S%H5178><s%> of brass; <S%H5178><s%> and he did grind <S%H2912><s%> in the prison <S%H631><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>
However, the hair <S%H8181><s%> of his head <S%H7218><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to grow <S%H6779><s%> again after <S%H834><s%> he was shaven. <S%H1548><s%>

Then the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> gathered <S%H6908><s%> them together for to offer <S%H2076><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> to Dagon <S%H1712><s%> their god, <S%H430><s%> and to rejoice: <S%H8057><s%> for they said, <S%H559><s%> Our god <S%H430><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> Samson <S%H8123><s%> our enemy <S%H341><s%> into our hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And when the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> him, they praised <S%H1984><s%> their god: <S%H430><s%> for they said, <S%H559><s%> Our god <S%H430><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> into our hands <S%H3027><s%> our enemy, <S%H341><s%> and the destroyer <S%H2717><s%> of our country, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> slew <S%H2491><s%> many <S%H7235><s%> of us.

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when <S%H3588><s%> their hearts <S%H3820><s%> were merry, <S%H2896><s%> that they said, <S%H559><s%> Call <S%H7121><s%> for Samson, <S%H8123><s%> that he may make us sport. <S%H7832><s%> And they called <S%H7121><s%> for Samson <S%H8123><s%> out of the prison <S%H631><s%> house; <S%H1004><s%> and he made them sport: <S%H6711><s%> and they set <S%H5975><s%> him between <S%H996><s%> the pillars. <S%H5982><s%>

And Samson <S%H8123><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the lad <S%H5288><s%> that held <S%H2388><s%> him by the hand, <S%H3027><s%> Suffer <S%H3240><s%> me that I may feel <S%H4184><s%> the pillars <S%H5982><s%> whereupon <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> stands, <S%H3559><s%> that I may lean <S%H8172><s%> on them.

Now the house <S%H1004><s%> was full <S%H4390><s%> of men <S%H582><s%> and women; <S%H802><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> were there; <S%H8033><s%> and there were on the roof <S%H1406><s%> about three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> and women, <S%H802><s%> that beheld <S%H7200><s%> while Samson <S%H8123><s%> made sport. <S%H7832><s%>

And Samson <S%H8123><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> O Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3069><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> me, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, and strengthen <S%H2388><s%> me, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, only <S%H389><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> once, <S%H6471><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> that I may be at once avenged <S%H5358><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> for my two <S%H8147><s%> eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

And Samson <S%H8123><s%> took hold <S%H3943><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> middle <S%H8432><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> on which <S%H834><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> stood, <S%H3559><s%> and on <S%H5921><s%> which it was borne <S%H5564><s%> up, of the one <S%H259><s%> with his right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> and of the other <S%H259><s%> with his left. <S%H8040><s%>

And Samson <S%H8123><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let me die <S%H4191><s%> with the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%> And he bowed <S%H5186><s%> himself with all his might; <S%H3581><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on the lords, <S%H5633><s%> and on all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that were therein. So the dead <S%H4191><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he slew <S%H4191><s%> at his death <S%H4194><s%> were more <S%H7227><s%> than they which <S%H834><s%> he slew <S%H4191><s%> in his life. <S%H2416><s%>

Then his brothers <S%H251><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%> came <S%H3381><s%> down, <S%H3381><s%> and took <S%H5375><s%> him, and brought <S%H5927><s%> him up, and buried <S%H6912><s%> him between <S%H996><s%> Zorah <S%H6881><s%> and Eshtaol <S%H847><s%> in the burial plot <S%H6913><s%> of Manoah <S%H4495><s%> his father. <S%H1><s%> And he judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>
